channel.title: Low priority: BlastPit noclip crash
channel.description:
index buffer..tell a programmer (32790>32768)
In the big fan room for the 2nd silo. If you noclip to access the other vents (which I think lead to the same room), a engine crash occurs.

item.title: Low priority: BlastPit noclip crash
item.dc:creator: Wmilin
item.description:
same thing. It’s a place like a big tube with a large cooler on the bottom. When i turn iy on and lifting up i choose each tunnel and get to one room! From every enter which is lighted with red light. The one with white lighted is too high and impossible to be reached.
What should I do ?

Read full topic
